Description: Established a scholarship for any student who wanted to attend the local college Hiwassee College
Asked 7th & 8th graders to buddy with another student and promised $500 in cash if they both graduated high school. High school dropout rate declined from 35% to 6%.
Used royalties from "I will always love you" to build business in black neighborhoods in Nashville/honoring whitney
Established a scholarship fund to every year award $15,000 each to 5 Sevier county students.
Donation to a new hospital (Fort Sanders Sevier Medical Center) and performed a free concert to raise money
Dollywood's economic impact is assessed to be 1.8 billion per year Dolly Parton plans another $300,000 expansion, to add another approximate 2,500 jobs.
Wrote a personal check and raised money to help families who lost their homes due to the Smokey Mountain Wildfires
Donated to Monroe Caroll Jr. Children's Hospital.
